data.title: Courteney Cox - Latest News, views, gossip, photo and video
data.meta_description: Get the latest news updates on Courteney Cox, US actress and Friends star on Mail Online.
data.text:
Courteney Cox, 60, and her daughter Coco, 20, enjoy dinner date at celeb hotspot Giorgio Baldi in Santa Monica

Courteney Cox was spotted on a fun date with her daughter Coco Arquette in Los Angeles on Wednesday night. The star treated the 20-year-old musician to dinner at celeb haunt Giorgio Baldi.

Courteney Cox's daughter shares what she wishes her mother would have done differently on Friends

Courteney Cox's daughter has joked it was 'very rude' of her famous mother not to have saved her any clothes from her Friends wardrobe.

Courteney Cox, 60, is a wrinkle-free beauty as she flashes her bra in a chic black top while heading to dinner at an exclusive restaurant in LA

Courteney Cox had dinner at celebrity hot spot Giorgio Baldi in Santa Monica. The Friends star - who turned 60 in June - kept her look casual but chic in a black blouse with several buttons undone.

Courtney Cox's dog adorably FAILS the viral 'Hands In Challenge' in a hilarious new video: 'She's cute. She's got that going for her'

Courteney Cox tried to take part in the viral Hands In Challenge with one of her dogs... but the pooch didn't exactly cooperate.

Jennifer Aniston wishes Courteney Cox's longtime boyfriend Johnny McDaid a happy 48th birthday on Instagram

Following the death of their costar Matthew Perry's death in October, Courteney Cox celebrated Matt LeBlanc's birthday shortly after marking Courteney Cox's partner Johnny McDaid's big day

Anna Faris wishes she got to know Matthew Perry better when she guest-starred on Friends... and says he suggested her for the role

On the final season of Friends, Anna played a pregnant woman named Erica whose baby is adopted by Matthew's character Chandler and his wife Monica, played by Courteney Cox.

The (Hollywood) stars are aligned! Centre Court plays host to the A-list as Julia Roberts joins Zendaya, Tom Cruise and Courteney Cox in the Royal Box for the Wimbledon men's final

Taking to her seat in the Royal Box, Hollywood veteran Roberts, 56, looked appropriately stylish in a white Gucci minidress and heavily tinted sunglasses ahead of the sporting showpiece.

Courteney Cox, Cristiano Ronaldo and Rita Ora hail -200C cryotherapy as the ultimate wellness hack - but as experts warn it could leave you disfigured, could the trend be left out in the cold?

As Courteney Cox reveals cryotherapy is her ultimate anti-ageing hack, FEMAIL takes a look at the true implications of the wellness hack loved by British and Hollywood celebs.

I'm an anti-ageing expert. This is what happened when I tried 60-year-old Courteney Cox's incredible routine (and what REALLY works to make her so startlingly youthful)

Is it worth trying Courteney's routine? I'm a tweakments expert and over the past 20 years I've tried almost all the anti-ageing treatments there are out there.
